scripts.fmt: bun x prettier --plugin prettier-plugin-sh -w **/*.sh .sample/run.sh new.sh **/*.ts **/*.md *.md && terraform fmt **/*.tf .sample/main.tf
scripts.fmt:ci: bun x prettier --plugin prettier-plugin-sh --check **/*.sh .sample/run.sh new.sh **/*.ts **/*.md *.md && terraform fmt -check **/*.tf .sample/main.tf
